label: 男絵
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: One type of Hiean secular narrative emakimono that is closely associated with an anecdotal, supposedly factual, ultimately oral genre of very short stories called setsuwa.  Examples are Shigisan engi emaki and Ban dainagon emaki (p. 413-415). [説話、信貴山縁起絵巻、伴大納言絵巻]
